steps.description: Speak to Brother Qwinn in South Karana. Give him a Purple Headband and a Red Sash to receive a Rare Robe Pattern.
Speak to Brother Zephyl in Rathe Mountains. Give him a Black Headband and a White Sash to receive a Rare Robe Pattern.
Go to Lake Rathetear and find Brother Balatin. Give him both Rare Robe Patterns along with three 500pp pieces to receive Robe of the Lost Circle.
Go to Dalnir and kill Trakanon to loot the Rare Robe Pattern.
Go to Timorous Deep and find an Iksar Master. Give him the Robe of the Lost Circle and Rare Robe Pattern to receive Robe of the Whistling Fists.
Speak to Deep in Chardok. Give him the Robe of the Whistling Fists and three Pipe pieces from Kylong, Charasis, and Karnor's Castle to receive the Robe of the Celestial Fists.
Kill Targin the Rock in Lower Guk and loot the Code of Zan Fi.
Kill Raster of Guk in Lower Guk and loot the Idol of Zan Fi.
Give Code of Zan Fi and Idol of Zan Fi to Kaiaren in Lake Rathetear. He will attack youâ€”let him kill you.
Speak to Kaiaren again and give him the Book of Celestial Fists to receive a Celestial Fist Book.
Speak to Kaiaren again and give him Celestial Fist Book to receive a Book of Celestial Fists.
Find Eejag in Lavastorm Mountains and kill him to loot an Earth Fist.
Go to Plane of Air and kill the Iksar Master to loot an Air Fist.
Kill Gwan in Timorous Deep to loot a Fire Fist.
Kill Trunt in The Overthere to loot a Water Fist.
Kill Deep in Chardok to loot a Celestial Fist.
Combine Earth, Air, Fire, Water, and Celestial Fist in the Book of Celestial Fists to create a Completed Celestial Fists.
Give Completed Celestial Fists to Kaiaren in Lake Rathetear to receive the Monk Epic 1.0 - Celestial Fists.
